about_the_game:
Welcome to the dark world of Slavic mythology, scary tales and epics!

Meet the mystical evil lurking in Slavic folk tales.




Evil spirits appears in our world and there is no control over it. Baba Yaga, goblin, ghosts: they all try to harm ordinary people, kill and eat them. Mysterious appeals and rituals take place that break the balance in the world.




Take on the role of a battle priest trained in a special squad to fight evil spirits. Sharpen your battle axe, sanctify the water and go to the hideout of evil to protect the last stronghold of humanity.



Use various unique weapons to fight evil spirits
Use your weapons wisely. The main character will have a choice: give life or take it away.
Use the dark forbidden power to survive at any cost
Danger can lie in wait for the protagonist from any direction. Use various artifacts of evil to survive no matter what, but be careful, because these items can negatively affect the main character.
Explore the world of the game and help ordinary people in the fight against the evil spirits that have invaded this world
Travel the world, complete tasks and fight evil in the name of protecting ordinary people.
Collect forbidden artifacts belonging to evil
Collect rare monster artifacts and collect them in your cell.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Scary Tales is a tactical first-person action arena set in a mystical setting of Slavic folk tales. The story tells about a young priest from a special squad who fights against various evil spirits that exist in our world.
